DOC.brief_summary: Most of the reports on hypnosis in the literature have focused on pain control during minor operations. With this study we aimed to evaluate the role of hypnosis on sedation for transesophageal echocardiography and compare it with commonly used sedative midazolam.
DOC.brief_title: Hypnosis vs Midazolam for Sedation for TEE
DOC.criteria: indications for TEE American Society of Anesthesiology (ASA) physical status IIII mental illness, psychotropic medication use, hypersensitivity to drugs a body mass index over 30.
